title: ISO8601_TIME
description:
Represents an absolute point in time from an origin usually interpreted as meaning the start of the current day, specified to the second.

NOTE: A small deviation to the ISO 8601:2004 standard in this class is that the time 24:00:00 is not allowed, for consistency with ISO8601_DATE_TIME.
$comments: Defined in Base_types IM, inherits from ISO8601_TYPE
